error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Huckleberry. Check the error details above.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Check the error details above.
error.no_children: No children found in your Huckleberry account.
error.account_disabled: Your Huckleberry account has been disabled.
error.too_many_attempts: Too many login attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
error.timeout: Connection timed out. Check the error details above.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check the error details above.

abort.already_configured: This Huckleberry account is already configured.
